actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to provide retirement annuities for certain widows of members of the uniformed services who died before the effective date of the survivor benefit plan.

summary.text: Authorizes the payment of retirement annuities for specified classes of widows of members of the uniformed services who died before the effective date of the Survivor Benefit Plan.

titles.title: A bill to provide retirement annuities for certain widows of members of the uniformed services who died before the effective date of the survivor benefit plan.
